job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
PRANOS.ai is Palo Alto, CA based and founded by Y-combinator S18 alums. The revolutionary mass media platform converts any car window into a digital display. Our pioneering technology is designed to deliver captivating consumer-generated digital out-of-home content on the fly.DescriptionThe Embedded systems engineer will work closely with our CTO (Y combinator S18 alum) and other senior engineers to develop PRANOS.ai’s embedded systems for users worldwide. Building in&nbsp;Python, C, and C++&nbsp;, the Embedded Systems Engineer will deliver the cleanest, most efficient, and reliable applications for our customers. Architect and grow a new codebase, working with remote development teams integrating technical input and feedback from PRANOS.ai’s product and design teams on enhancements, new features, testing, accessibility, and documentation.Responsibilities  - Write clean, well documented, and well tested code using best practices for React and React-Native development   
  - Work closely with CTO and collaborate with Design, Product, and Engineering teams as well as mentor and coach remote development teams to ensure the highest quality product is delivered   
  - Debug and develop mobile platform specific features on iOS and Android in a React Native codebase   
  - Design and contribute to the high-performance backend services that drive the mobile apps   
  - Commit to best practices for testing, logging, and deployments   
  - Stay up to date with industry trends and advise the team on best practices to implement   
  - Qualifications   
  - Experience building large, high traffic frontend codebases in React Native   
  - Proven ability to ship high quality, testable, and accessible code quickly   
  - Experience working on mobile performance and accessibility   
  - Experience debugging mobile applications on iOS and Android   
  - Demonstrated experience working in diverse, equitable, and inclusive environments on cross-functional on innovative projects   
  - Believe in continuous learning, sharing best practices, and making global impact   
  - Possess a customer-first mindset and data-driven approach to your work   
   Email resumes and Linkedin link to: David@pranos.aiV.V.V.Employment Type  - Full-time Contractor
